name: Duo (itch) (GuestAppearance)
description:
Welcome to Duo!

This game is a two player boss fight where one player controls the "Hero" and the other player controls the "Boss".  Fight to the death to see who emerges victorious!

Performance Note!

Two keyboards is optimal for playing this game as controller support is not provided. Controller support will be added in a future update provided that this game gets revisited. Sorry for the inconvenience. 

Enjoy the fight!

Extra Info...

This game served as a final project for an intro level Game Art/Development course. Because of this,  the  game is far from perfect,  constructive criticism is appreciated.
